5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Abdullah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘If anyone of you is uncertain about his prayer, let him try to do what is correct then let him prostrate twice.’” Tanafisi said: "This is the basic rule, and no one is able to reject it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ شَكَّ فِي صَلاَتِهِ فَتَحَرَّى الصَّوَابَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning one who is uncertain about his Prayer, so he should try to do what is correct
